quest.name: Don't Stop the Music
journal:
Managingway seems to be mulling over music.

â€»Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with the laboring Loporrit in Greatest Endsvale.
Deliver the requested items to Managingway.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Considering the success of our musicking station, I do believe its equipment will require extra maintenance.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Can you imagine the glum disappointment that awaits us should our music fail to play during peak merriment? I shudder to even consider it.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: I tasked one of our Ways with preparing spare parts for the audio apparatus. However, that was some time ago, with nary a whisper of their progress since.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Could I trouble you to lend them assistance? They are no doubt hard at work in Greatest Endsvale.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT4687
dialogue.text: Have you come to help me? Oh, you are very nice. There are still so many pieces I must make and I've been making them for ever so long...

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT4687
dialogue.text: Like these metal parts for our amplifiers. Could you make some of those? I have plenty of supplies here, if you need any more.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT4687
dialogue.text: Like these little parts for our speakers. Could you help with some of those? I have plenty of supplies here, if you need any more.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT4687
dialogue.text: Like these delicate parts for our wiring. Could you make some of those? I have plenty of supplies here, if you need any more.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT4687
dialogue.text: Once you're finished, go on ahead and take them to Managingway. I may be a while yet...

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT4687
dialogue.text: Did you run out of supplies? O-Oh, you were joking. Ha ha! ...Funny.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT4687
dialogue.text: Did you run out of supplies? O-Oh, you were joking. Ha ha! ...Funny.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT4687
dialogue.text: Did you run out of supplies? O-Oh, you were joking. Ha ha! ...Funny.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT4687
dialogue.text: Did you run out of supplies? Goodness knows I've plenty to spare...

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT4687
dialogue.text: Did you run out of supplies? Goodness knows I've plenty to spare...

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT4687
dialogue.text: Did you run out of supplies? Goodness knows I've plenty to spare...

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: How fares our helper? Have they made progress with the spare parts?

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Marvelous! With these pieces, I daresay our music will be free of malfunction for some time yet.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Originally, our audio apparatus was meant to broadcast Burrow-wide announcements for our guests, but as we no longer expect visitors from Etheirys, we repurposed the equipment.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Only time will tell if our musicking station's requirements exceed the capabilities of our apparatus...but in the meantime, we shall do our utmost to keep everything in working order.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: I do hope you will assist us again, Forename. Please accept this small token of our appreciation.
